sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import './Keyboard.css' const HIDDEN_SYMBOL = '❓' const Keyboard = ({ ALPHABET }) => (
onClick(index)}> {feedback === 'hidden' ? HIDDEN_SYMBOL : keyboard}
) Keyboard.propTypes = { keyboard: PropTypes.string.isRequired, feedback: PropTypes.oneOf([ 'hidden', 'visible', 'alreadyChosen' ]), index: PropTypes.number.isRequired, } export default Keyboard
